welcome_description: Find the precise direction of the Qibla anywhere in the world with elegance and accuracy.
compass_unavailable_msg: This device does not appear to have a magnetic sensor/compass. The compass-based Qibla direction will not be available.
location_permission_msg: Location permission is required to determine your current position for calculating the Qibla.
location_unavailable_msg: Unable to get your location. Please ensure location services are enabled.
